## AbstractDevice.runNextFrame() method

Schedules a function to be executed at the beginning of the next frame

**Signature:**

```typescript
runNextFrame(f: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  f | () =&gt; void | The function to be scheduled |

**Returns:**

void
